description: Hey I wanted to leave a review and say I love this addition to discord. I did want to request an update as it seems I have to launch the app manually every time from the discover store, and the settings have disappeared so I can no longer control the app. It also is not populating in the side bar. Again, great app - just needs to be tweaked a bit. Thanks
